param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling.

param.name: icon_container_margin_top
param.label: Icon Container Top Margin
param.description: Which margin do you need? Example: -40px or 40px etc.

param.name: icon_titles
param.label: Icon Titles
param.description: Do you like to show titles?

param.name: icon_title_color
param.label: Icon Title Color
param.description: Which color should the icon titles have? If you leave the field empty the defined link color from your template is used. Must be valid: #ffffff or white etc

param.name: icon_title_fontsize
param.label: Icon Title Fontsize
param.description: Which fontsize should the icon titles have? If you leave the field empty the defined link size from your template is used. Must be valid: 12px etc

param.name: icon_orientation
param.label: Icon List Orientation
param.description: which way would you like the list to go?.
param.option: Vertical - icons to left of titles
Vertical - icons to right of titles

param.name: incCSS
param.label: Include CSS
param.description: Would you like to include the CSS file for this module.

param.name: icon_height
param.label: Icon Height
param.description: Enter the height of the icon without the unit eg: 40 instead of 40px

param.name: icon_width
param.label: Icon Width
param.description: Enter the width of the icon without the unit eg: 40 instead of 40px

param.name: icon1_status
param.label: icon 1 Status
param.description: Registered+ this will only show the menu item to registered users and above.

param.name: icon1_img
param.label: Icon 1 Image
param.description: choose the icon you want to use

param.name: icon1_target
param.label: Icon 1 Target
param.description: Choose whether the icon click will open a new window/tab or not

param.name: icon1_title
param.label: Icon 1 Title
param.description: type in the title of your icon

param.name: icon1_link
param.label: Icon 1 URL
param.description: enter the desired URL

param.name: icon1_alt
param.label: Icon 1 Alt
param.description: this is important for validation
